chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), NetHandler (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st')

Premises:
Inductive Msg : Set := Lock : Msg | Unlock : Msg | Locked : Msg
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [num_Clients : nat |- Type] ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- Type]
name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
pSrc = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (pSrc, _, _) := p in pSrc : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> name Arguments pSrc {P params}
Output = Msg : Set
Inductive Name : Type := Client : Client_index -> Name | Server : Name
locks_correct_locked = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => pBody p = Locked -> exists c : Client_index, valid_locked (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments locks_correct_locked _%function_scope
NetHandler = fun (nm src : Name) (m : Msg) => match nm with | Client c => ClientNetHandler c m | Server => ServerNetHandler src m end : Name -> Name -> Msg -> Handler Data
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> msg Arguments pBody {P params}
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
locks_correct = fun sigma : name -> data => forall n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = n :: t : (name -> data) -> Prop Arguments locks_correct _%function_scope
pDst = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, pDst, _) := p in pDst : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> name Arguments pDst {P params}
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
locks_correct_unlock = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => pBody p = Unlock -> exists c : Client_index, valid_unlock (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments locks_correct_unlock _%function_scope
Inductive Label : Type := InputLock : Client_index -> Label | InputUnlock : Client_index -> Label | MsgUnlock : Label | MsgLock : Client_index -> Label | MsgLocked : Client_index -> Label | Nop : Label | Silent : Label
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : name; pDst : name; pBody : msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record Data : Type := mkData { queue : list Client_index; held : bool } Arguments mkData _%list_scope _%bool_scope
locks_correct_input_handlers : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')
Build_Decomposition : forall (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) (state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop) (network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop) (network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop), (forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 -> network_network_invariant p2 p1) -> state_invariant init_handlers -> (forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')) ->...-> Decomposition B M
Record Decomposition (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) : Type := Build_Decomposition { state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop; network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant_sym : forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 ->...-> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) } Arguments Build_Decomposition _ _ (_ _ _ _)%function_scope _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
state_invariant_maintained_deliver : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_deliver_old : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p q : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant sigma q -> network_network_invariant p q -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') q where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = pDst p -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') p' where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_network_invariant_maintained_deliver_old : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' q : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant sigma q -> network_network_invariant p q -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = pDst p -> network_network_invariant p' q where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_input_new : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ps -> pSrc p = h -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
ClientNetHandler_cases : forall (c : Client_index) (m : Msg) (st : Data) (u : Label) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), ClientNetHandler c m st = (u, out, st', ms) -> ms = [] /\ (st' = st /\ out = [] /\ m <> Locked \/ m = Locked /\ out = [Locked] /\ held st' = true)
locks_correct_update_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : Data) (x : Client_index), locks_correct sigma -> held st' = false -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (Client x) st')
locks_correct_update_true : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index) (st' : Data), held st' = true -> at_head_of_queue sigma c -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (Client c) st')
unlock_in_flight_all_clients_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet), pBody p = Unlock -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> locks_correct sigma -> forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false
locks_correct_at_head_preserved : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data), locks_correct sigma -> (forall c : Client_index, at_head_of_queue sigma c -> at_head_of_queue (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') c) -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st')
LockServ_network_invariant = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => locks_correct_unlock sigma p /\ locks_correct_locked sigma p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments LockServ_network_invariant _%function_scope
network_invariant_maintained_input_old : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_network_invariant_maintained_input_old : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = h -> network_network_invariant p p' where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
all_clients_false_locks_correct_server_update : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (st : Data), (forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false) -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st)
LabeledStepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (lb : label), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> lb_net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> lb_step_failure (failed, net) lb (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]
LabeledStepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (lb : label), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> lb_net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> lb_step_async net lb net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
InputHandler_cases : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (st : Data) (u : Label) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i st = (u, out, st', ms) -> (exists c : Client_index, h = Client c /\ (i = Lock /\ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = [(Server, Lock)] \/ i = Unlock /\ out = [] /\ held st' = false /\ (held st = true /\ ms = [(Server, Unlock)] \/ st' = st /\ ms = []))) \/ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = []
StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)] where ?P0 : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailureParams ?P]
snoc_at_head_of_queue_preserved : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (st' : Data) (x : Client_index), queue st' = queue (sigma Server) ++ [x] -> forall c : Client_index, at_head_of_queue sigma c -> at_head_of_queue (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') c
StepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_async net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_dup net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
StepDrop_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_drop net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]
locks_correct_locked_at_head : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) (c : Client_index), pDst p = Client c -> pBody p = Locked -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> at_head_of_queue sigma c
lb_step_failure_ind : forall P : list name * network -> label -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (lb : label), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> lb_net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) lb (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P p l p0 l0
lb_step_failure_sind : forall P : list name * network -> label -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (lb : label), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> lb_net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) lb (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P p l p0 l0
ServerNetHandler_cases : forall (src : Name) (m : Msg) (st : Data) (u : Label) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), ServerNetHandler src m st = (u, out, st', ms) -> out = [] /\ ((exists c : Client_index, src = Client c /\ m = Lock /\ queue st' = queue st ++ [c] /\ (queue st = [] /\ ms = [(Client c, Locked)] \/ queue st <> [] /\ ms = [])) \/ m = Unlock /\ queue st' = List.tl (queue st) /\ (queue st' = [] /\ ms = [] \/ (exists (next : Client_index) (t : list Client_index), queue st' = next :: t /\ ms = [(Client next, Locked)])) \/ ms = [] /\ st' = st /\ m <> Unlock)
state_invariant_maintained_input : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
step_dup_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_dup_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
lb_step_async_ind : forall P : network -> label -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (lb : label), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> lb_net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net lb net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n l n0 l0
lb_step_async_sind : forall P : network -> label -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (lb : label), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> lb_net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net lb net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n l n0 l0
step_async_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_async_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_failure_ind : forall P : list name * network -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailureParams ?P]
step_failure_sind : forall P : list name * network -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailureParams ?P]
step_drop_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l

```coq
intros p sigma u st' out ms H Handler_correct Locked_correct Unlock_correct Locked_correct_unlock.
unfold locks_correct; intros n Held.
destruct (name_eq_dec (pDst p) n) as [Eq | Neq].
+ rewrite Eq. assumption.
+ apply Held.
Qed`
```

original:
coq
intros p sigma u st' out ms H Handler_correct Locked_correct Unlock_correct Locked_correct_unlock.
unfold locks_correct; intros n Held.
destruct (name_eq_dec (pDst p) n) as [Eq | Neq].
+ rewrite Eq. assumption.
+ apply Held.
Qed`
